titles.title: O Lord! When we the path retrace

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord! When we the path retrace Which Thou on earth hast trod, To men Thy wondrous love and grace, Thy faithfulness to God;{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Faithful amidst unfaithfulness, ’Mid darkness only light, Thou didst Thy Father’s name confess, And in His will delight;{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unmoved by Satan’s subtle wiles, Or suffering, shame, and loss, Thy path, uncheered by earthly smiles, Led only to the cross.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord, with sorrow and with shame, We meekly would confess, How little we, who bear Thy Name, Thy mind, Thy ways express.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We wonder at Thy lowly mind, And fain would like Thee be, And all our rest and pleasure find In learning, Lord, of Thee.{/lang-eng}
